children.description: Iván executes a POST on the resource /api/v3/pet

testSteps.description: Then the platform will indicate an alert related to the invalid id supplied

children.description: The HTTP/HTTPS status code should be 400
Then the Invalid ID supplied message should be 'Input error: unable to convert input to io.swagger.petstore.model.Pet'
